thread.title: Blake Lively’s balloon flower wall is random AF, but we want it at every party
thread.title_full: Blake Lively’s balloon flower wall is random AF, but we want it at every party

author: Johnni Macke
title: Blake Lively’s balloon flower wall is random AF, but we want it at every party
text:
Blake Lively’s balloon flower wall is random AF, but we want it at every party Sometimes you don’t know what you want in life until Blake Lively Instagrams about it. We’re loving Blake Lively’s balloon flower wall , and want it at our next wedding, baby shower, birthday, whatever. We just really love flowers, and we love balloons, so why not have both?
On Wednesday, Lively attended the Michael Kors Fall 2017 runway show at New York Fashion Week. After taking in all the fabulous looks, she posed in front of a balloon flower wall, which is SO random, but we love it .
The 29-year-old actress looked like a flower herself in a Michael Kors gown, and matching Lorraine Schwartz rings.
...I mean. C'mo 
A post shared by Blake Lively (@blakelively) on Feb 15, 2017 at 8:36am PST 
Seriously, she looked like a flower threw up on her, but in a good way.
“…When the carpet matches the drapes,” Lively captioned her pretty in pink photo.
...When the carpet matches the drapes 
A post shared by Blake Lively (@blakelively) on Feb 15, 2017 at 8:30am PST 
While we’re not sure where this wall came from, or why it’s happening, it’s giving us major party inspiration.
This isn’t the first time this week that Lively has posed in front of a balloon wall, and we’re sure it won’t be her last.
On Monday, she hosted a wonderful Galentine’s Day celebration with L’Oreal Paris, and again there were pink balloons.
Anna Webber/Getty Images It’s official we need balloon walls at our bridal shower, bachelorette party, baby shower, etc. They are SO fabulous.
Since flower walls have been all the rage since Kim Kardashian and Kanye West had one at their wedding this is a new spin on the idea.
We aren’t however, cutting out the idea of having a full-on flower wall at our next event either. On Valentine’s Day, West brought it back by surprising Kardashian at home , and we’re again in love.
#kim #kimkardashian #kimkardashianwest #kimksnapchat #kimksnapchats #kimkardashiansnapchat #kkw #london #paris #milan #newyork #la #miami #atlanta #kimye #kuwtk #kardashians #snapchat #lifestyle #orchids #flowers #happyvalentinesday #kanyewest #kimye 
A post shared by Kim Kardashian Snapchats (@kimksnapchats) on Feb 14, 2017 at 6:24pm PST 
There are white roses and orchids everywhere, it’s wonderful!
Which wall trend is your favorite? Balloons or flowers? Or, balloon flowers?
